metadata.name: Art is subjective
metadata.description:
This is a painting by my 5 year old son. He was GRADED on a scale of 4.5 and this received a 3.5. 

As a parent I have NO comprehension of how a teacher could possibly grade a kindergartener on a painting, but here we are. 

ART IS SUBJECTIVE and should NEVER be graded. We are minting this to show that anyone and everyone can be an artist no matter what. 

I set up his own wallet and will give him sole access to the funds when he gets older.
